signup.title: Let's get you in!
signup.description: Already have an account ? <link> Login instead </link>
signup.tos: I accept the <terms>Terms of Use</terms> & <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>

recovery.title: Forgot your password ?
recovery.description: Enter your email to get a reset link

signin.title: Welcome back!
signin.description: Do not have an account yet? <link> Create an account </link>

hero.title: Find Your Perfect Remote Work Spot
hero.description: Connect with a diverse selection of locations offering top-notch WiFi, comfortable ambiance, and essential amenities, tailored for digital nomads, freelancers, and anyone seeking a productive change of scenery.

feature.title: WORK ANYWHERE, ANYTIME
feature.description: In a world where work is no longer tied to a specific place, our platform bridges the gap between comfort and productivity. Find locations that resonate with your work style and preferences.

worldwide.title: Explore Workspaces Worldwide
worldwide.description: Whether you're in your hometown or halfway across the globe, our platform connects you to local workspaces with global standards.

tailored.title: Tailored Search
tailored.description: Every remote worker has unique needs. Our platform provides detailed information on noise levels, comfort, and facilities, so you can choose a spot that feels right for you.

community.title: Community and Collaboration
community.description: Engage with a community of like-minded remote workers. Share tips, find collaborative spaces, and exchange information on the best working spots in town.

place.title: Latest places added
place.description: Explore the latest spots added by fellow remote workers like you

editor.title: Add a new Place
editor.description: Search a place below, then provide as much info as you can to create a new place

notfound.title: You have found a secret place.
notfound.description: Unfortunately, this is only a 404 page. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL.
notfound.return: Take me back to home page
